title: News24.com | EXPLAINER: Do men fare worse with Covid-19?
description: Worldwide over 1.4 million people have been infected with the virus, leading to some 86 000 deaths.
content:
Death and infection tolls from the Covid-19 pandemic spreading around the world point to men being more likely than women to contract the disease and to suffer severe or critical complications if they do.
This, according to studies and health experts, has be… [+274 chars]
